description:
NIVEA SUN Sensitive Protect Sunscreen Lotion SPF50 provides you with broad spectrum protection and moisturising care whilst being suitable for sensitive skin. Made with quality ingredients your sensitive skin is protected and cared for. Enjoy the sun with quality care using NIVEA!

NIVEA SUN Sensitive Protect Sunscreen Lotion SPF50 cares for your skin in more ways than one, combining broad spectrum sun protection whilst being suitable for sensitive skin. Highly effective UVA and UVB filters shield skin from sun damage. The non-greasy formula helps to soothe and calm reactive skin, made with quality ingredients such as Aloe Vera and Chamomile. Plus, the fragrance free formula with moisturising Vitamin E helps protect and repair the skin by keeping it hydrated resulting in it being less vulnerable to sun damage. The skin compatibility of this sunscreen has been dermatologically tested and approved. Made in Australia.

SPF50: increases the skin's natural sunburn protection by at least 50 times

UVA + UVB Protection: protection against skin ageing and sunburn

Quality Ingredients: made with Aloe Vera, Chamomile and Vitamin E

Suitable for Sensitive Skin: Free of perfumes and colourants

Lasting Protection: 4 hours water resistant

Skin Safe: compatibility dermatologically approved
name: Nivea Sun Sensitive Protect Spf50 Sunscreen Lotion 200ml
